entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:25 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: W 32 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
